trans-unit.source: Big Compute: Technical resources for batch and high performance computing (HPC) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Big Compute: Technical resources for batch and high performance computing (HPC) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Lists technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and HPC workloads in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Lists technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and HPC workloads in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Big Compute in Azure: Technical resources for batch and high performance computing (HPC)
trans-unit.target: Big Compute in Azure: Technical resources for batch and high performance computing (HPC)

trans-unit.source: This is a guide to technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and HPC workloads in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This is a guide to technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and HPC workloads in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Extend your existing batch or HPC workloads to the Azure cloud, or build new Big Compute solutions in Azure using a range of Azure services.
trans-unit.target: Extend your existing batch or HPC workloads to the Azure cloud, or build new Big Compute solutions in Azure using a range of Azure services.

trans-unit.source: Learn about Big Compute options in Azure, and choose the right approach for your workload and business need.
trans-unit.target: Learn about Big Compute options in Azure, and choose the right approach for your workload and business need.

trans-unit.source: Video: Big Compute in the cloud with Azure and HPC
trans-unit.target: Video: Big Compute in the cloud with Azure and HPC

trans-unit.source: [Batch](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/batch/) is a platform service that makes it easy to cloud-enable your applications and run jobs without setting up and managing a cluster and job scheduler.
trans-unit.target: [Batch](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/batch/) is a platform service that makes it easy to cloud-enable your applications and run jobs without setting up and managing a cluster and job scheduler.

trans-unit.source: Use the SDK to integrate client applications with Azure Batch through a variety of languages, stage data to Azure, and build job execution pipelines.
trans-unit.target: Use the SDK to integrate client applications with Azure Batch through a variety of languages, stage data to Azure, and build job execution pipelines.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Getting started with Azure Batch library for .NET
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Getting started with Azure Batch library for .NET

trans-unit.source: Deploy or extend your existing Windows or Linux HPC cluster to Azure to run your compute intensive workloads.
trans-unit.target: Deploy or extend your existing Windows or Linux HPC cluster to Azure to run your compute intensive workloads.

trans-unit.source: HPC Pack is Microsoft's free HPC solution built on Microsoft Azure and Windows Server technologies.
trans-unit.target: HPC Pack is Microsoft's free HPC solution built on Microsoft Azure and Windows Server technologies.

trans-unit.target: HPC Pack on Windows Server 2012 R2

trans-unit.target: Create an HPC cluster with a custom compute node image

trans-unit.target: Create an HPC cluster with Linux compute nodes

trans-unit.target: HPC Pack IaaS deployment PowerShell script

trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Get started with Linux compute nodes in an HPC Pack cluster in Azure

trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Run NAMD with Microsoft HPC Pack on Linux compute nodes in Azure

trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Get started with an HPC Pack cluster in Azure to run Excel and SOA workloads

trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Set up a hybrid cluster with HPC Pack in Azure

trans-unit.target: Burst to Azure with HPC Pack

trans-unit.source: Use these Azure quickstart templates to deploy Linux HPC clusters with open source tools.
trans-unit.target: Use these Azure quickstart templates to deploy Linux HPC clusters with open source tools.

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft MPI](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb524831.aspx) (MS-MPI) is a Microsoft implementation of the Message Passing Interface standard for developing and running parallel applications on the Windows platform.
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft MPI](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb524831.aspx) (MS-MPI) is a Microsoft implementation of the Message Passing Interface standard for developing and running parallel applications on the Windows platform.

trans-unit.source: Azure offers a [range of sizes](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-size-specs.md), including compute intensive [A8, A9, A10, and A11 instances](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-a8-a9-a10-a11-specs.md), to run your Linux and Windows HPC workloads.
trans-unit.target: Azure offers a [range of sizes](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-size-specs.md), including compute intensive [A8, A9, A10, and A11 instances](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-a8-a9-a10-a11-specs.md), to run your Linux and Windows HPC workloads.

trans-unit.source: Set up a Linux RDMA cluster to run MPI applications
trans-unit.target: Set up a Linux RDMA cluster to run MPI applications

trans-unit.target: A8 and A9 instances: Quick start with HPC Pack

trans-unit.target: Run MPI applications on A8 and A9 instances

trans-unit.source: [Large-scale computing - financial services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=536378) (PDF) shows how to operationalize and orchestrate large-scale computation and data analysis in the cloud for risk management, reporting, and simulations.
trans-unit.target: [Large-scale computing - financial services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=536378) (PDF) shows how to operationalize and orchestrate large-scale computation and data analysis in the cloud for risk management, reporting, and simulations.

trans-unit.source: For the latest announcements, see the [Microsoft HPC and Batch team blog](http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowshpc/) and the [Azure blog](http://azure.microsoft.com/blog/tag/hpc/).
trans-unit.target: For the latest announcements, see the [Microsoft HPC and Batch team blog](http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowshpc/) and the [Azure blog](http://azure.microsoft.com/blog/tag/hpc/).

trans-unit.source: Also see [what's new in Batch](http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=batch) or subscribe to the [RSS feed](http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/feed/?service=batch).
trans-unit.target: Also see [what's new in Batch](http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=batch) or subscribe to the [RSS feed](http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/feed/?service=batch).
